item.title: 01-01: Introduction to Digital History
item.description: 01-01: Introduction to Digital History .underline { text-decoration: underline; } /* Position computations of klipse get confused by reveal.js's scaling. Hence, scaling should be disabled with this code. Fix height of code area with scrollbar (use overflow instead of overflow-y to restore CodeMirror setting afterwards): */ .reveal section pre { max-height: 70vh; height: auto; overflow: auto; } /* Reset some reveal.js and oer-reveal settings: */ .reveal section pre .
